text: Hi all anyone know what is the limit in HubSpot for upload video or store videos and images in files.

Hi everyone, I’m new to the community and wanted to introduce myself. I’m not a developer but a B2B SaaS marketer focusing on GTM planning including demand generation and acquisition. Currently,  I’m an independent growth consultant with Inturact, a data-science backed growth agency for founder-led B2B SaaS.  

I’m a HubSpot power user and have a question on campaign-level reporting. Campaign in this instance would include all the assets for single channel direct response campaigns like paid ads as well as multi-channel/multi-touch campaigns like lead nurture on email + retargeting + any other relevant channel. I want to be able to report MQLs (ie hand-raisers or automation scored leads), SQLs (booked calls with MQLs), pipeline, and ARR on a campaign-level broken down by channels (with UTMs), showing the last-touch channel prior to conversion of that lead into an MQL.  

My question:  How feasible is it to build this reporting in HubSpot?  

Thanks!
Hi there, i would like to set up a group of users to only be able to edit (web)pages assigned to a specific domain. Is this possible in HubSpot?
